item.title: Warrior fight tips
item.description: Quick and dirty notes for non-speedrunners. P1S: Nothing special. Full uptime fight. Holmgang big busters 1 and 4. P2S: -9s Prepull IR might be a gain. However, it is possible to do a basic IC IR IC opener, and keep IR on cooldown while managing mechanics. Yes, you can use IR before Limit Cut happens. You’ll get 2-3 IR FCs out. If you only got two IR FCs out, the third one will stay ready until the boss is back again.
